Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Finland 
   Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il's famous work "On Having Correct Understanding of Originality of Kimilsungism" was brought out in booklet by the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea on Oct. 23.

articles.title: Moves to Suppress Forces for Progressive Reforms under Fire in S. Korea
articles.content:
Information Bulletin Released in Democratic Congo 
   Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- Special issues of information bulletins were published by the People's Rally for Socialism and the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo on Oct. 14 and 16 on the occasion of the 61st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 80th anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
 The bulletins wrote about the immediate tasks and ultimate goal of the DIU, noting that WPK began striking its historical roots with the formation of the DIU by President Kim Il Sung on Oct. 17, 1926.    
 They elaborated on the fact that the Korean revolution which started with the formation of the DIU made a long drive and the WPK has unswervingly succeeded the tradition of the DIU under the leadership of Kim Jong Il who is successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of the President.
